attributes.action: Make it legal to buy monster energy drinks available for 14 year olds and older
attributes.additional_details: The reason behind my particition is because i think that it would be a good and healthyer option to teens rather than vapping and ruining there lungs at a young age and addaping bad habbits
attributes.background: Make it more accessible to younger people as it is not as unhealthy for people as one might think

rejection.details: It is already legal for people aged 14 and older to buy energy drinks. Individual retailers can restrict sales of energy drinks to people under a certain age if they choose.
